name: Assessment
text:
An initial assessment of each participant shall determine priority for participation in JOBS.  A comprehensive assessment may follow to determine barriers to participation in the program and may include, but is not limited to:



	(1)	A review of the family circumstances to identify social and health problems and needs; and
	(2)	Identification of child care, transportation, and other supportive services needs. [L 1990, c 321, pt of §1]
